name: Containment (MiniLD #58)
description:
Containment is a single player reinvention of Pong, where your aim is to keep the ball on the screen for as long as you can by moving the paddles using either the WASD keys/the arrow keys.

Your score is determined by how many times you manage to bounce the ball, with the game gradually getting faster with each bounce.

For every streak of 20 bounces you achieve, you get a 3-second Slow Time power-up, which you can activate using the Space key.
